intents.name: AddMemoryIntent
samples: add memory with question {MemoryQuestion} and with answer {MemoryAnswer}

name.value: my best vacation was the one in japan
i visited london for the first time in 1976
ask my caregiver how to do this
go to the book shelf and find a book
put on my boots and warm up
find a calm place and close my eyes
put on shoes and go for a walk
gather clothes and put them in the washing machine
wake up and go for a run

synonyms: she went to school with me
